Class HighscoreHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      HighscoreHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class HighscoreHandler
extends java.lang.Thread

This is the HighscoreHandler class. Responisble for writing a new highscore to a local file on the server.

Version:
2018-03-xx
Author:
Hasse Aro

run

public void run()
Every second checks if current highscore is higher than stored highscore if it is then it updates the highscore.
